title: $59+ O/W Fall Airfare Sale
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $59+ O/W Fall Airfare Sale $59+ O/W Fall Airfare Sale August 11, 2015 4:00pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Fall travel—specifically on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Saturdays during September 10 - November 5—is on sale through Monday, August 17 from Alaska Airlines. The airfare promotion offers flights to varied destinations throughout the U.S., including Chicago, Honolulu, Las Vegas, plus international places like Los Cabos. Fares start at $59 one-way ($118 round-trip), and must be booked at least 14 days in advance and by 11:59 p.m. PT on August 17.

Fall travel—specifically on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Saturdays during September 10 - November 5—is on sale through Monday, August 17 from Alaska Airlines. The airfare promotion offers flights to varied destinations throughout the U.S., including Chicago, Honolulu, Las Vegas, plus international places like Los Cabos. Fares start at $59 one-way ($118 round-trip), and must be booked at least 14 days in advance and by 11:59 p.m. PT on August 17. 
See the sale provider for travel to non-continental U.S. destinations. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of this sale by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros:
